demo.name: Meta-Agentic α-AGI Jobs Demo V5 — Sovereign Meta-Conductor
demo.narrative:
The sovereign owner clicks once and AGI Jobs v0 (v2) composes the entire
alpha-creation factory: anomaly detection, world modelling, guardian mesh
coordination, treasury optimisation, and gasless job dispatch. Every
control is editable without code.

params.description: Meta-agentic retrofits for trillion-scale alpha conversion across energy, biotech, and supply networks.
params.title: Meta-Conductor Sovereign Alpha Retrofit

demo.name: Meta-Agentic α-AGI Jobs Demo V5 — Sovereign Meta-Conductor
demo.narrative:
The sovereign owner clicks once and AGI Jobs v0 (v2) composes the entire
alpha-creation factory: anomaly detection, world modelling, guardian mesh
coordination, treasury optimisation, and gasless job dispatch. Every
control is editable without code.

params.description: Meta-agentic retrofits for trillion-scale alpha conversion across energy, biotech, and supply networks.
params.title: Meta-Conductor Sovereign Alpha Retrofit
